column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ yɛtwee hɛnho fii hɔn nkyɛn na hɛn wusihɛn no tui no
column3: yɛnam tsenn baa Kos
column4: na n’adzekyee no yedur Rodes

column2: "na yehun wusihɛn a orutwa mu kɔ Fonisia no
column3: yɛkɔr mu na yetui."
yegyaa no bankum
column4: na yɛkɔr Siria
column5: na yebodwiir Taere: nna hɔ na wusihɛn no rukotu n’adzesoa egu."

column3: yɛtsenaa hɔ nda esuon: hɔn na wɔnam Sunsum no mu kaa kyerɛɛ Paul dɛ mma onntu n’anan nnsi Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ yewiee nda no dzi no
column3: yesii mu kɔr hɛn kwan; na hɔn nyina nye hɔn yernom nye hɔn mba begyaa hɛn kwan bodur dɛ yefii kurow no mu; na yebubuu ntwɛr wɔ mpoano hɔ bɔɔ mpaa
column7: na hɔn so wɔsanee kɔr hɔn efiefi."

column2: "Na yewiee ɔkwan a ofi Taere twa no
column3: yekodur Petolemais na yekekyiaa enuanom no
column4: na yedzii hɔn nkyɛn da kor."

column3: yefii hɔ na yɛbaa Kaesarea; na yɛkɛhɛɛn asɛmpakafo Filip a ofi beesuon no mu no ne fie kɛtsenaa hɔ."
mbaabun a wɔhyɛ nkɔm."

column2: "Na yɛkyɛɛr hɔ nda kakra ara yie no
column3: nkɔnhyɛnyi bi a ne dzin dze Agabus fii Judea bae."
ɔfaa Paul n’abɔdo
column4: na ɔdze kyekyeer nankasa ne nan nye ne nsa
column6: Mbrɛ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn no se nye yi
column7: Dɛmara na Jewfo a wɔwɔ Jerusalɛm no bɛkyekyer ɔbarimba a abɔdo yi yɛ nedze
column8: na woeyi no ahyɛ amanamamfo nsa."

column3: yɛnye hɔn a wofi kurow no mu no serɛɛ no dɛ mma ɔnnkɔ Jerusalɛm."
Hom reyɛ dɛn nye yi
column4: na hom rusu rububu m’akoma yi? Na mesiesie moho dɛ
column6: na eso mubowu wɔ Jerusalɛm wɔ Ewuradze Jesus ne dzin ntsi."

column3: yegyaa no dɛ
column4: Ewuradze ne pɛ nyɛ hɔ."

column3: yɛboaboaa hɛnho kɔr Jerusalɛm."

column2: "Na Kaesarea esuafo no mu bi so nye hɛn kɔree
column3: na wɔdze hɛn baa Menason
column4: Siprusnyi bi a ɔyɛ osuanyi dadaw no ne nkyɛn dɛ yɛrekɛtsena hɔ."

column3: enuanom no dze enyigye gyee hɛn."
Paul nye hɛn kɔr James nkyɛn; nna mpanyimfo no nyina wɔ hɔ bi."
ɔkaa ndzɛmba a Nyankopɔn nam no som do akɛyɛ wɔ amanaman mu nkorkor kyerɛɛ hɔn."
wɔhyɛɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam; na wɔsee no dɛ
column4: Onua
column5: ehu mpempem a wɔagye edzi wɔ Jewfo mu
column6: na hɔn nyina bɔ mbɔdzen wɔ mbra no ho;"

column2: "na wɔatse wo ho asɛm dɛ ekyerɛkyerɛ Jewfo a wɔwɔ amanaman mu nyina dɛ wɔndan Moses ngya
column3: na eka kyerɛ hɔn dɛ mma wontwa hɔn mba twatsia
column4: eso mma wonndzi amambra no do."

column2: "Na afei yɛnyɛ no dɛn? Ɔyɛ dɛn ara a wɔbɛtse dɛ aba ha."
"Dɛm ntsi yɛ dza yɛrese wo yi: yɛwɔ mbarimba baanan a woedzi nsew;"
"iyinom na fa hɔn na enye hɔn nkoguar homho
column3: na tua kaw ma hɔn ma wonyi hɔn tsir; na hɔn nyina nhu dɛ nokwar biara nnyi wo ho asɛm a wɔtsee no mu
column4: na mbom wankasa so enam pɛpɛɛpɛ idzi mbra no do."

column2: "Na amanamamfo a wɔagye edzi no ho dze
column3: yɛkyerɛwee kobuu atsɛn dɛ wonyi hɔnho mfi nam a wɔdze abɔ afɔr ama abosom
column4: nye bɔgya
column5: nye mbowa a wɔahyɛ hɔn fo

column3: na n’adzekyee no ɔnye hɔn guaar hɔnho na ɔkɔr asɔrfi no mu
column4: dɛ ɔrekɛkyerɛ ahoguar nda no n’ewiei
column5: na wɔakɔbɔ afɔr ama hɔn nyina nkorkor."

column2: "Na nda esuon reyɛ ewie so no
column3: Jewfo a wofi Asia hun no asɔrfi mu no
column4: wɔbɔɔ nyimpadodow no nkenyan
column5: na wɔdze nsa suoo no mu
column9: hom mboa: oyi nye nyimpa no a ɔkyerɛkyerɛ nyimpa nyina wɔ mbea nyina tsia ɔman nye mbra nye bea yi no: na ɔdze Griikfo so aba asɔrfi mu
column10: na ɔdze fi abɛka krɔnkrɔnbea yi."

column2: "Nna woedzi kan ehu Efesonyi Trofimus nye no wɔ kurow mu hɔ
column3: ɔno na wɔdween dɛ gyama Paul dze no akɔ asɔrfi mu no."
na nkorɔfo no dze mbirika bɔboaa ano; na wosuoo Paul mu
column4: na wɔtwee no fii asɔrfi no mu; na ntsɛmara wɔtotoow mbobow no mu."

column3: nsɛm no kodur nsordaafokuw no mu ɔsafohen panyin no n’asomu dɛ Jerusalɛm nyina abɔ ebutuw;"

column2: "ɔno na ntsɛmara ɔfaa nsordaafo nye ɔhamumpanyin
column3: na ɔdze mbirika kɔr hɔn do; na wohun ɔsafohen panyin no nye nsordaafo no
column4: wogyaa Paul hwe."

column3: na obosuoo no mu
column4: na ɔhyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn ebien nto no; na obisaa ne nyimpa ban nye dza ɔayɛ."

column3: binom so tseaa mu dɛm
column4: wɔ nyimpadodow no mu; na dede no ntsi na onntum nnhu no nokwar no
column5: ɔhyɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa no mbra aban no mu."

column3: ɔbaa dɛ nyimpadodow no hɔn gyigyeegye ntsi nsordaafo no soaa no;"

column2: "na ɔman no mu nyimpadodow dzii ekyir tseatseaa mu dɛ
column3: Wonyi no mfi hɔ!"

column2: "Na wɔdze Paul rekɛhɛn aban no mu no
column3: ɔsee ɔsafohen panyin no dɛ
column4: Ana mowɔ kwan dɛ meka asɛm bi kyerɛ wo? Na ɔsee no dɛ
column6: "Ana inyim Griik kasa? Ana nnyɛ ɔwo nye Egyptnyi a ndaano yi ɔyɛɛ sakasaka na ɔdze mbarimba a wofi ewudzifo no mu mpemanan kɔr sar do no bi?"

column3: Meyɛ Jewnyi a mifi Tarsus
column4: Silisia kurow a ɔwɔ dzin mapa no mu nyimpa nye me
column5: na meserɛ wo dɛ ma me kwan ma menkasa nkyerɛ ɔman no."

column3: Paul gyinaa atwer no do nyaam ne nsa kyerɛɛ nkorɔfo no; na wɔyɛɛ dzinn no
column4: ɔkasaa kyerɛɛ hɔn wɔ Hebriw kasa mu."
